TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ISponsor

summary.span: 指示實作器想要成為存留期使用期 (Lifetime Lease) 贊助者。

span.span: Indicates that the implementer wants to be a lifetime lease sponsor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件必須實作介面，需要要求特定物件進行租用更新。An object must implement the interface if it needs to request a lease renewal for a particular object. 物件，用於實作介面可能會變得贊助者註冊租用管理員本身。An object that implements the interface can become a sponsor by registering itself with the lease manager. 存留期服務會使用介面來回呼贊助者。The interface is used by the lifetime service to call back to the sponsor. ## Examples [!code-cpp[ISponsor_Client#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ISponsor_Client/CPP/isponsor_client.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[ISponsor_Client#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ISponsor_Client/CS/isponsor_client.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ISponsor_Client#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ISponsor_Client/VB/isponsor_client.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance valuetype System.TimeSpan Renewal(class System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease lease) cil managed
Public Function Renewal (lease As ILease) As TimeSpan

param.name: lease
param.span: 需要使用期更新的物件的存留期使用期。

span.span: The lifetime lease of the object that requires lease renewal.

summary.span: 要求贊助的用戶端更新指定物件的使用期。

span.span: Requests a sponsoring client to renew the lease for the specified object.

returns.span: 指定的物件的額外使用期時間。

span.span: The additional lease time for the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 更新指定的物件租用分散式的記憶體回收行程會呼叫方法。The method is called by the distributed garbage collector to renew the lease for the specified object. ## Examples [!code-cpp[ISponsor_Client#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ISponsor_Client/CPP/isponsor_client.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[ISponsor_Client#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ISponsor_Client/CS/isponsor_client.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ISponsor_Client#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ISponsor_Client/VB/isponsor_client.vb#2)]

exception.span: 立即呼叫者透過對介面的參考進行呼叫，且沒有基礎結構權限。

span.span: The immediate caller makes the call through a reference to the interface and does not have infrastructure permission.

permission.span: 營運與基礎結構程式碼。
